body.name: Homvana Air Purifier for Bedroom Home office, H13 True HEPA 6-Stage Filtration Air Cleaner, with Light Adaptive Auto Mode, 22dB Sleep Mode, Washable Filter, Ozone Free, for Pet Allergies Smoke Dust et
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 41 mins
features: ✅【Purify 215 ft² Air in 24mins】 Annoyed by the polluted air? Time to get rid of it! With its 360° air intake & outlet and sleek designed Hourglass shape making air accelerate spirally, Homvana H201 purifier refreshes the air 5 times per hour in rooms up to 215 ft²/ 20 m². Just taking a sip of coffee, you will find yourself immersed in the freshness. Furthermore, despite its High Efficiency, it only needs 1kWh to run for 30 days.

✅【True HEPA 6-Stage Filtration, Truly Pure Air】 Not 3 or 4 stages, but the newest stronger 6 stages! The H13 True HEPA 6-stage filter traps at least 99.97% particles of 0.1 microns in size, like dust, pollen, pet dander, and even pet smells, wildfire smoke, and VOCs. Enjoy the real pure air!

✅【Quieter-than-Whisper 22dB, Undisturbed Sleep】 Due to the exclusive SilentAir tech, Homvana provides you undisturbed sleep and lets you wake up in the fresh air with its sleep mode, which operates as low as 22dB, even quieter than a whisper.

✅【Light Adaptive, Auto Operation 24/7】 Auto mode automatically adjusts the fan speed based on the surrounding brightness. In the daytime, let you enjoy the powerful purification for high-traffic rooms, while at night, gently refreshes the air to help you breathe easier by its quietest fan.

✅【0% Ozone, 100% Safe】 Your 100% safe Air Cleaner, certified by all FCC, CE, UKCA, and ETL standards, also complies with California air resources board (CARB) for indoor cleaning devices, makes you totally reassured about the Ozone-Free air for yourself and even your little babies.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rapid Purification In just 24 mins, Homvana True HEPA Air Purifier h201, with its overriding 6-stage filtration, provides fast purification 5 times per hour in rooms up to 215ft². 360° Air Outlet With the top-facing design and 360-degree air circulation, you are free to enjoy the clean, fresh air to every corner of your home. Adaptive Auto Mode The thoughtful light adaptive auto mode is built for your convenience; Operates with the strongest fan in the high-traffic daytime, while using the quietest fan when you go to bed.

2/4/8H Timer Set a timer for 2, 4, or 8 hours to perfectly fit your schedule. Maintain powerful purification when necessary, and save energy when sleeping or going out. Filter Reset Reminder The Filter Reset button, with its red button light, reminds you of the time to change the filter after 3-5 months of use, depending on your usage. Search for "B09R1GBKS4" . Versatile Lighting Tap to select from 3 light brightness settings to create your perfect private space for reading, watching movies, playing games, or working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A great air purifier. So happy I got it. Easy clean filter. Different settings. Timer. Low noise on nightime steeing. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Homvana hepa air purifier
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. Product Is very easy to set up with clear directions and has simple touch features. I’m using it in a normal sized bedroom and the air seems pleasant after the first 24 hours of auto use. You'll need to purchase replacement filters as the main filter is not washable. The cord is too short at maybe 4 ft and too thin also the light from the “fan” and “on” positions is way too bright even on night setting so I covered the control panel with a metal lid to block the glow. It runs very quietly and seems to be a nice unit. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING! REMOVES GREEN WOOD SMOKE from my neighbors fireplace in my house
reviews.reviewText: Bought 1 Homvana Model H201 to remove green wood smoke from my bedroom...hopefully, ease or prevent our coughing fits. My house is an old, small house. The Homevana Model 201 worked so well in the bedroom, bought another one for the living room. Neighbors have their fireplace going right now, putting green wood smoke (green wood smokes much more than dried wood) in the outside air right now. The whole neighborhood smells like smoke. The wood smoke from the neighbors fireplace is rolling into my house every time somebody opens the door. With one air purifier running in the bedroom and one running in the living room, AMAZINGLY, there is no smoke odor in my house. Normally, when the neighbors burn wood my whole house smells like wood smoke. No wood smoke in my house is so wonderful because I can breathe without coughing, choking, sneezing, runny nose or my eyes watering.With the new Biden nomics it appears to me that people are dealing with problems paying their high cost heat bills; I am expecting more people to burn wood because here, they can cut it for themselves for free. I ordered a third air purifier to have on hand, just in case it is needed for any reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Good power for a small item. Not sure about filters yet. This popped up under my search for filterless (and washable) air purifier but only the removable cover is washable...there are still filters to replace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small footprint very quiet
reviews.reviewText: Have only been using it about a week but it is nice to not wake up with a dry sore throat every morning. It is an hour glass shape and will fit in most spaces. When in the sleep mode it is very quiet (fan speed is low) which is great. I would definitely recommend trying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fair price, quiet operation. And mechanical—- so it is ozone free. I wanted a small device for a small bedroom and this product is it. As to how effective it might be in filtering air compared to others, I have no idea and no way to compare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these for our bedrooms. They are the perfect size and work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
